item.description:
Most of us have a bit more of some things than we need and a bit less of some others that we might find valuable. Do you have an abundance of grape jam but no pickles or preserved tomatoes? Too much sour dough starter but no vegetable seeds? Too many sauce pans but no fresh herbs?

Then join us for our first community trading event!

The Basics:

The swap will start at 1:00 and continue until 3:00.
This will be a true bartering event with no cash exchanges.
Please bring items that you believe others would value.
Please label any food items with your name, ingredients and date.
Clothing and household items are welcome but you must take home what you don't trade.

The success of this meetup will depend on a good number of participants. So spread the
word to your friends in the area!
item.how_to_find_us: Please do NOT park in numbered spaces. Only park in visitors parking, which is along the long side of the road, near the railroad tracks. Thanks!
item.name: North of Boston Trading Event
